title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How AI Agents are Changing the Way Revenue Teams Work (STP110)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI代理如何改变收入团队的工作方式 (STP110)
abstract: Revenue teams sits on a mountain of untapped data split across structured data in the CRM, unstructured data in emails, transcripts and time-series product usage data in databases. Workflows are also fragmented across multiple point tools leading to loss of productivity. Rox is building the first AI native revenue operating system from the ground up to unify all the data on top of a warehouse and power AI agents to run automated workflows end to end. We’ll highlight real customer examples where our revenue agents have helped sellers identify new opportunities and close deals faster. Join us to explore how AWS and Rox are turning static data into dynamic, outcome-driven workflows.
abstract_cn: 收入团队坐拥大量未开发的数据，这些数据分散在CRM中的结构化数据、电子邮件和转录文本中的非结构化数据，以及数据库中的时间序列产品使用数据。工作流程也分散在多个单点工具中，导致生产力下降。Rox正在从零开始构建首个AI原生收入运营系统，以在数据仓库之上统一所有数据，并为AI代理提供支持，实现端到端的自动化工作流程。我们将展示真实客户案例，说明我们的收入代理如何帮助销售人员识别新机会并更快地完成交易。加入我们，探索AWS和Rox如何将静态数据转化为动态的、结果驱动的工作流程。
